org.w3c.dom.as
Interface DOMImplementationAS

All Superinterfaces:
DOMImplementation
public interface DOMImplementationAS
extends DOMImplementation

This interface allows creation of an ASModel. It extends the DOMImplementation interface. An object that implements DOMImplementationAS is obtained by doing a binding specific cast from DOMImplementation to DOMImplementationAS.

See also the Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Abstract Schemas and Load and Save Specification.

Method Summary

          Creates an ASModel.

          This can specify a schema type or may be null if the implementation can infer the schema type.
 boolean isContainer()
          To indicate if the ASModel is simply a container of other ASModels.

          This can specify a schema type or may be null if the implementation can infer the schema type.

createAS

ASModel createAS(boolean NamespaceAware,
                 java.lang.String schemaType)
Creates an ASModel.

Parameters:
NamespaceAware - Allow creation of ASModel with this attribute set to a specific value.
schemaType - This can specify a schema type or may be null if the implementation can infer the schema type.
Returns:
An ASModel.
